thread.title: Tower Bridge closed due to possible bomb threat
thread.title_full: Tower Bridge closed due to possible bomb threat

author:
Cathy Locke 
clocke@sacbee.com
title: Tower Bridge closed due to possible bomb threat
text:
January 31, 2017 3:34 PM Tower Bridge closed due to possible bomb threat 
Covering crime, police and courts in the Sacramento region 
By Cathy Locke 
The Tower Bridge over the Sacramento River between Sacramento and West Sacramento has been raised to prevent woman who may have a bomb from crossing the bridge from West Sacramento. 
Sgt. Roger Kinney, West Sacramento police spokesman, said the pulled her car onto the bridge and may have made threats of a bomb, but he said the bomb threat had not been confirmed. 
Kinney said police asked that the bridge be raised to prevent the vehicle from crossing the bridge. He said police had set up a large perimeter and negotiators were be called to the scene. 
Return to sacbee.com for updates. The Tower Bridge is closed, as is an extended zone around the bridge, due to a security threat. Please use alternative routes & avoid area.
